item.title: Main Deck Side Cargo Door Latch Lock System (Interior Master Latch Lock Handle Shear Pin)

remarks.para: Shear pin may be inoperative or missing provided:

numlitem.para: Exterior master latch lock handle is operative,
There is no damage to the master latch lock mechanism, and
Door is locked using the exterior master latch lock handle.

placard.para: Placard on main Deck Side Cargo Door control panels: "INTERIOR MASTER LATCH HANDLE INOP – USE EXTERIOR HANDLE". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Visually check the side cargo door to ensure that there is no damage to the latch mechanism or the exterior master latch lock mechanism.
The door must be locked and unlocked using the exterior master latch lock handle only.
Door may be opened and closed using normal procedures.
